item.title: Glossary of Web3 Account
item.description: One of the most talked-about subjects at DevCon was account abstraction. Recently, you may have noticed acronyms and abbreviations like AA, EOA, SCW, and 4337 in a variety of presentations, panels, and streams. After reading these two sentence s, your brain must already be hurting. Next, I’ll try to help you figure out what all these terms and ideas really mean. This article is not a serious technical document, so it may use words that aren’t exact but are easy to understand. You are invited to use it as a starting point to learn more about these technologies.
